My job

I specialise in JavaScript application, startup project, growth hacking and creative coding.

I have experience with Node.js-based web apps, REST API development and MVPs creation with Meteor. Also experienced with contemporary frontend technologies such as AngularJS, Browserify and Bash/NPM/Gulp/Grunt for project automation.

I have Agile experience and I'm comfortable working in teams of all sizes at all stages of the project lifecycle from planning through to delivery.
